body_html:
I run the code in gdb, and here's the error message:

Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
THPUtils_tryUnpackLongs (arg=0x5, result=...) at torch/csrc/utils.cpp:36
36	  bool tuple = PyTuple_Check(arg);

I'm using python 3.5

body:
I run the code in gdb, and here's the error message:
```
Program received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
THPUtils_tryUnpackLongs (arg=0x5, result=...) at torch/csrc/utils.cpp:36
36	  bool tuple = PyTuple_Check(arg);
```
I'm using python 3.5
